name: European Bedding Industries' Association
goal:
- Represent its members' interest with the European authorities in all matters related to the industry, in particular regarding environment, health and safety.
- Undertake/promote scientific and/or market research related to the sleeping comfort.
- Enhance national or international actions to promote the bedding industry.
- Promote personal contact and communication amongst its members.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Environment, Public Health, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
- Circular Economy
- REACH
- Biocides Directive
- EC Ecolabel
